trans-unit.source: Provides access to the security settings for endpoints configured with the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso às definições de segurança para pontos finais configurados com o enlace de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security mode for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de segurança para o enlace de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: Valid values for this property are: - Transport - Use transport-based security.
trans-unit.target: Os valores válidos para esta propriedade são: segurança baseada no transporte de – Transport - utilização.

trans-unit.source: The default setting uses NTLM which does not provide server authentication.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição utiliza NTLM que fornece autenticação de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"></xref> for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"> </xref> para o enlace de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>propriedade foi alterado de valor predefinido e devem ser serializada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Isto é utilizado pelo WCF para integração com o XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>valor da propriedade deve ser serializada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the transport security for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a segurança de transporte para o enlace de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: This method gives access to the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> for the named pipe transport through <xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite o acesso <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>para o transporte de pipe nomeado através de <xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity"></xref> for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity"> </xref> para o enlace de pipe nomeado.
